ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(IF(!ISBLANK(Spouse_s_Birth_Date__c),Spouse_s_Birth_Date__c>= TODAY(), FALSE ), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_Account == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Spouse's Birth Date should not be today or greater than today.
